fields.title: Grandad's turned into a dragon!
fields.lineStart: My mum said I had to visit my Grandad Joe. I was annoyed, as he can be really boring. But I went to his house because I am the best son. I knocked on the door. There was no answer, but then I heard a growl from inside...

fields.title: The Bubble that Wouldn't Pop
fields.lineStart: It was a really big bubble. Bigger then a really big dog, but smaller than a small sized nan. But there was something special about it. It wouldn't pop!

fields.title: Mrs Pickles Haunted Cake Shop
fields.lineStart: Mark was excited about his birthday. His mum said he could have any cake he wanted from his favourite cake shop. But when he went in no one was there. Not even the owner, Mrs Pickles. 'Hello?' he said, timidly. And then ALL the lights went out!

fields.title: Pirates on a space adventure
fields.lineStart: Captain Blackbeard put on his spacesuit and stepped outside his spaceship, 'The Mary Celestial'. 'Arg!', he said, to no one in particular.

fields.title: @Lantis: The lost website.
fields.lineStart: Ella was in history class. The teacher was talking about an old website called '@Lantis.' Apparently it was the best website EVER. It could make all your dreams come true. But then one day, it disapeered....

fields.title: The kitten with the silly meow
fields.lineStart: 'Meow!' meowed Shaun. His owner nearly fell over. Shaun was hiding under the sofa again, and even though he was small he had the loudest meow!

fields.title: Vampire Ninja's from Outer Space
fields.lineStart: 'Hurry up mum,' said Nat to her mum. She was always running late. 'I can't be late for karate, I am going to get my black belt today.'

fields.title: Professor Smith's exploding bum
fields.lineStart: Professor Smith was in his laboratory doing science. He was trying to make a formula that would stop everyone farting forever. He think he'd cracked it.
